alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 8:39PM CDT until March 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Taylor County, especially the eastern half of the county. * WHEN...The greatest freezing rain threat will be before 3 am, with snow then expected until midday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
